title: VIkram Gautham Menon Dhruva Natchathiram shooting new schedule to begin in Chennai from Monday - Tamil Movie News
text: Vikram in Ajith mode for GVM? Actor Vikram teamed up with director Gautham Menon and the duo gave a sweet shock to fans and film buffs by releasing the teaser of their international spy thriller flick 'Dhruva Natchathiram', on the Pongal festival day last month. Vikram seems to be continuing to shoot for this film. Here is the latest update about the project of his super exciting project that we have gathered from a reliable source. Ten days of shoot has taken place in Coonoor so far. It is worth recalling that Vikram released a video with some women workers of tea estates from Coonoor. The next schedule of shoot will begin in Chennai from Monday (February 6). It looks like Vikram will complete a large chunk of shoot for 'Dhruva Natchathiram' before starting work on director Vijay Chander project for Silver Line Film Factory banner.
